articles.description: Sheffield Wednesday missed out on big Jayden Stockley last summer, but now – with transfer restrictions removed – they could try to sign him again.
articles.content:
The 28-year-old joined Charlton Athletic for around £500,000 a year ago, and went on to score 20 goals in all competitions for the Addicks in an impressive debut season.
Wednesday were keen on him b… [+1228 chars]

articles.title: Moeen Ali: ‘Would I be available for the Test team? The door is open’ - The Guardian
articles.description: Worcestershire all-rounder reflects on his OBE for services to cricket and hints at a possible Test comeback with England
